trans-unit.source: Indicates a serialization surrogate selector class.
Surrogate selectors implement the ISurrogateSelector interface to assist formatters in selecting surrogates to delegate to the serialization or deserialization of other objects.
trans-unit.target: Erstatning kolonneoverskriftene implementere grensesnittet ISurrogateSelector for å hjelpe formaterere å velge surrogater delegerer til serialisering eller deserialisering av andre objekter.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the next <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"></xref> for surrogates to examine if the current instance does not have a surrogate for the specified type and assembly in the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Angir neste <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"> </xref> for surrogater å undersøke Hvis gjeldende forekomst ikke har en erstatning for den angitte typen og samlingen i den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: This method is protected by a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specified.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er beskyttet av en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>for den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>med den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>angitte.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The next surrogate selector to examine.
The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har ikke den nødvendige tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the next surrogate selector in the chain.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer neste erstatning velgeren i kjeden.

trans-unit.source: This method is protected by a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specified.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er beskyttet av en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>for den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>med den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>angitte.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The next surrogate selector in the chain or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Neste erstatning velgeren i kjeden eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har ikke den nødvendige tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: Finds the surrogate that represents the specified object's type, starting with the specified surrogate selector for the specified serialization context.
trans-unit.target: Finner erstatning som representerer angitt objekttypen, starter med den angitte erstatning velgeren for den angitte serialisering konteksten.

trans-unit.source: This method is protected by a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specified.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er beskyttet av en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>for den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>med den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>angitte.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of object (class) that needs a surrogate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>for objektet (klasse) som trenger en erstatning.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The source or destination context for the current serialization.
trans-unit.target: Kilden eller målet konteksten for gjeldende serialisering.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"></xref> that holds a reference to the surrogate selector where the appropriate surrogate was found.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, inneholder en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"> </xref> som inneholder en referanse til erstatning velgeren der den riktige erstatning ble funnet.

trans-unit.source: The appropriate surrogate for the given type in the given context.
trans-unit.target: Den riktige erstatning for den angitte typen i den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har ikke den nødvendige tillatelsen.
